name: Sensible World of Soccer '97/'98
summary: Unofficial update for Sensible World of Soccer 96/97 (Amiga). After SWOS development ended in 1996, some fan projects tried to keep SWOS up-to-date, like the Cresswell brothers from England, Gideon and Dom Cresswell, along with various others. who collected data from several internet forums and created an unofficial update to '97/'98 for Amiga.
